summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 42nd Avenue West, from West Barrett Street to West Armour Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading, constructing sewers and watermains, and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 10763 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
